text: Reckingen-Gluringen was a municipality, in the new municipality of Goms and the district Goms in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2004, the former municipalities of Reckingen and Gluringen merged into the new municipality of Reckingen-Gluringen. == References == ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Former municipalities of Valais
title: Reckingen-Gluringen
